trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una matrice di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> controlli

trans-unit.source: The `ToolStripArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `CoolBar` control array.
trans-unit.target: Il `ToolStripArray` classe fornisce un equivalente per la funzionalità in fase di esecuzione di Visual Basic 6.0 `CoolBar` matrice di controlli.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Non fornisce le funzionalità in fase di progettazione di una matrice di controlli Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funzioni e gli oggetti di <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>dello spazio dei nomi sono destinati all'utilizzo con gli strumenti per l'aggiornamento da Visual Basic 6.0 a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, queste funzioni e oggetti duplicano funzionalità disponibili in altri spazi dei nomi di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: E sono necessari solo quando il modello di codice Visual Basic 6.0 è notevolmente diverso rispetto di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> in un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray"> </xref> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il `Click` evento passa un <xref:System.EventArgs>per il gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto indica solo che si è verificato un clic.

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se sono necessarie informazioni più specifiche di mouse (pulsante, numero di clic, alla rotazione della rotellina o alla posizione), utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick>evento.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick>evento non essere generato se il clic è determinato da un'azione del mouse, ad esempio premendo il tasto INVIO.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Un doppio clic è determinato dalle impostazioni relative al mouse del sistema operativo dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può impostare l'intervallo tra i clic effettuati con un pulsante del mouse che deve essere considerato un doppio clic anziché come due clic distinti.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il `Click` evento viene generato ogni volta che viene fatto doppio clic su un controllo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a control, the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispongono di gestori eventi per il `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>eventi di un controllo, il `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>vengono generati quando il controllo si fa doppio clic ed entrambi i metodi vengono chiamati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: Se si fa doppio clic un controllo e che non supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento, il `Click` evento potrebbe essere generato due volte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <xref uid="langword_csharp_Protected" name="Protected" href=""></xref> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Poiché questa classe non è in genere utilizzata per creare un'istanza della classe, questo <xref uid="langword_csharp_Protected" name="Protected" href=""> </xref> metodo in genere non viene chiamato direttamente, ma viene invece chiamato da una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: Il `GiveFeedback` evento viene generato quando viene avviata un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: With the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Con il `GiveFeedback` evento, l'origine di un evento di trascinamento può modificare l'aspetto del puntatore del mouse per fornire l'utente indicazioni visive durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
trans-unit.target: Il `Item` proprietà è la proprietà predefinita per una matrice di controlli.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, le righe di codice seguenti sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# MsgBox(CStr(ToolStripArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(ToolStripArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chiavi eventi si verificano nell'ordine seguente: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>per gestire gli eventi di tastiera solo a livello di modulo e non abilitare i controlli per la ricezione di eventi della tastiera, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>il metodo di gestione degli eventi per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene premuto un tasto e il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: Chiavi eventi si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>il `KeyPress` evento non viene generato da questi tasti; tuttavia, questi tasti generano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>proprietà per campionare le sequenze di tasti in fase di esecuzione e per utilizzare o modificare un sottoinsieme di sequenze di tasti comuni.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire gli eventi di tastiera solo a livello di modulo e non abilitare i controlli per la ricezione di eventi della tastiera, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>il metodo di gestione degli eventi per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario riposizionare i controlli figlio di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il `Layout` evento si verifica quando i controlli figlio vengono aggiunti o rimossi, quando i limiti del controllo cambia e quando vengono apportate altre modifiche che possono influenzare il layout del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: L'evento layout può essere soppresso mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: La sospensione del layout consente di eseguire più azioni su un controllo senza dover eseguire un layout per ogni modifica.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si ridimensionare e spostare un controllo, ogni operazione genererebbe un `Layout` evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando lo stato attivo viene spostato il controllo.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando si modifica lo stato attivo tramite la tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), oppure chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: Fare clic su un pulsante del mouse quando il puntatore è posizionato su una forma in genere genera la seguente serie di eventi dal controllo: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseUp>due clic distinti che si verificano in rapida sequenza, come determinato dalle impostazioni del mouse del sistema operativo dell'utente, verrà generato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>evento anziché il secondo `MouseClick` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseUp> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Click> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventi sono logicamente di livello superiore di un controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Vengono spesso generati da altre azioni, ad esempio premendo il tasto INVIO quando il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Un tipico utilizzo di `MouseHover` consiste nel visualizzare una descrizione comandi quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma su un controllo all'interno di una determinata area intorno al controllo (il "area rettangolare").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Necessario generare questo evento viene specificato in millisecondi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il `MouseHover` evento viene definito e rilevato in relazione la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio e consente all'origine del trascinamento di determinare se l'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Il `QueryContinueDrag` evento viene generato quando viene apportata una modifica nello stato pulsante layout di tastiera o mouse durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Il `QueryContinueDrag` evento consente all'origine del trascinamento di determinare se l'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>del controllo ridimensionato, è possibile eseguire il cast di `sender` parametro del <xref:System.EventArgs>dati da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e ottenere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>proprietà (o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>proprietà singolarmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire layout personalizzati, utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout>invece dell'evento di `Resize` eventi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout>evento viene generato in risposta a un `Resize` evento, ma anche in risposta ad altre modifiche che hanno effetto sul layout del controllo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, queste funzioni e oggetti duplicano funzionalità disponibili in altri spazi dei nomi di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: E sono necessari solo quando il modello di codice Visual Basic 6.0 è notevolmente diverso rispetto di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementazione.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si modifica lo stato attivo dalla tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), chiamando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o metodi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>, o impostando la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>sul form corrente, si verificano gli eventi di attivazione nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> `Validated` se la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>è impostata su `false` , il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating>e `Validated` vengono soppressi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>è impostato su `true` nel <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating>delegato dell'evento, tutti gli eventi che in genere si verificano dopo il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating>evento verranno soppressi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>, o impostando la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>sul form corrente, si verificano gli eventi di attivazione nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave>Validating <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave>convalida <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated>Se la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>è impostata su `false` , la convalida in corso e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated>vengono soppressi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Validated> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ToolStripArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the Validating event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the Validating event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>è impostato su `true` nel delegato dell'evento di convalida, vengono eliminati tutti gli eventi che in genere si verificano dopo l'evento Validating.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
